name: Avoid Dungeon 1.1
description:
Avoid Dungeon Beta

collaboration between S74 and ItsStoneHere
This game is about avoiding growing green eyes while exploring a dungeon/floating forest open world map. You should start from the right-hand side, but note that this is in development, there will be updates most months if we get over 100 downloads. The updates will include changes to the map, enemies, art, skins, and mobile support if possible.

How to play:

You press the left or the right key to go left or right, but you cannot control your jump plus it's randomized, Ha! Ha! Ha! Chaotic, don't you think...
